title: Pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working! (ANOTHER POST)
body:
I have now made about 3 or 4 posts about the pvp.net patcher kernel error. I have been trying for the past 2 days to get help. Yesterday i put in a ticket for support but when i requested a human it deemed my problem "solved" I guess i will now make another ticket, But i just wanted to post this again in hopes someone will see it and help me. :D PLEASE. HALP. I'd rather not miss this event considering i've bought one of the skins.

(Old) Ticket number: #30688659

(new/ just submitted) Ticket number: #30701783

So please.... Someone help me {{champion:32}}

replies.body: So i made the second ticket to try and get help, and once blitzcrank bot replied it said my problem was solved :(

If the permissions guide didn't work, putting in a ticket was a solid step.  Blitzbot is not a specialist, but an automated smart tool...thing.  There should be a button that says request a human, which will send your ticket to our tech team.  They will be your best bet in helping to figure this out, but I also recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs.  

Attach those logs to your ticket, and our tech team will respond back as soon as they can.

I know you're eager to get this resolved, and we really want to help.  Just be really wary about spamming threads or tickets, because it can only cause confusion and delay.  Hang tight!
On both of the tickets when i requested a human, the ticket status was changed to solved, idk what that means.. i have the hextech repair tool & logs i just dont know how to add them on the ticket.

Blitzbot will automatically set a ticket to solved.  You can always reply to a ticket that's Solved until it's set to Closed.  I fielded your ticket for you just in case manually, so it's in queue for our tech team to take a look!  There should be an option in the ticket center to attach your file to the ticket.  I hope that helps!

Welp idk what happened, but i randomly tried launching and it worked... so yeah :D thx for the help :DD
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Most of the time when your client has a hard time getting the patcher kernel working, it's being caused because your OS is stopping the client from accessing certain files. Sometimes your OS doesn't recognize certain programs as being safe and you need to tell it those files are okay. Try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that helps!
I tried updating my permissions already, none of it really worked D: At this point i really dont know what to do..
